channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Agent

item.title: CVE-2018-6703|2024-08-05T06:10:11.293Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20agent
item.description: Use After Free in Remote logging (which is disabled by default) in McAfee McAfee Agent (MA) 5.x prior to 5.6.0 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to cause a Denial of Service and potentially a remote code execution via a specially crafted HTTP header sent to the logging service.
